column4: Traffic;Banteay Meanchey:------ Royal Cambodian Armed Forces license plates are for military vehicles used only for military service
column5: but some have been rented to foreigners to use
column6: which is a military offense.------On the afternoon of May 18
column8: the military police force of Poipet City detained a Chinese man who was driving a car with RCAF license plate 02-2-9139 in Poipet.------Police said the suspect told them he had hired the vehicle and did not know it was illegal.------Later
column9: the military police force of Poipet City conducted interviews and the man signed contracts to stop using the RCAF license plate number. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/442004
